TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Madawdaw, title = Madawdaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madawdaw} }

S.FORM: alang Madawdaw ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Cinkong Song, kwara sali buwan nya ga 1,085 buwan, 3,046 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 59% kyan ku 1,796 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 41% kyan ku 1,250 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 55%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Madawdaw hya' ga Cirarokohay. tay mkyahu' na Madawdaw hya' ga Ciliksay. tay 'llaw na Madawdaw hya' ga Kalahaay. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Madawdaw ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Cinkong Song, kwara sali bowan nya ga 1,085 bowan, 3,046 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 59% kyan ko 1,796 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 41% kyan ko 1,250 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 55%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Madawdaw hya' ga Cirarokohay. tay mkyaho' na Madawdaw hya' ga Ciliksay. tay 'llaw na Madawdaw hya' ga Kalahaay. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
